greetingSend.mainTitle:
Pick an e-Greeting
design and add
your wish

designTemplates.preFillText: Semoga diberi kesihatan yang baik serta rezeki yang luas dan berpanjangan.
Salam dihulur buat ingatan, buat keluarga juga kenalan. Selamat Hari raya Aidilfitri, Maaf Zahir dan Batin.
Tangan dihulur, maaf dipinta. Selamat Hari raya Aidilfitri, Maaf Zahir dan Batin.

to loved ones.

isBoosterFestiveEven.title: Tap, Track, Win: Transact to earn +3 entries!
isBoosterFestiveEven.description: It's your lucky even day! Every eligible transaction you make today earns you extra entries to win an all-expenses-paid trip to Maldives for 2 adults! Keep transacting for more entries to win cash prizes too. T&C apply. Tap below to view your Trackers.

isBoosterFestiveOdd.title: Tap, Track, Win: Check in now for +4 entries to win prizes!
isBoosterFestiveOdd.description: You could win an all-expenses-paid trip to Maldives for 2 with Tap, Track, Win, tap below to check in and earn your entry now! Then, keep transacting for more entries to win. T&C apply.

nonBoosterEven.title: Tap, Track, Win: Transact now to win exciting prizes!
nonBoosterEven.description: Win an all-expenses-paid trip to Maldives for 2 adults when you pay bills, transfer, reload and more! Every eligible transaction earns you entries to win cash prizes too. Make a transaction now to earn your next entry. T&C apply. Tap below to view your Trackers.

nonBoosterOdd.title: Tap, Track, Win: Check in now to win exciting prizes!
nonBoosterOdd.description: Check in daily for entries to win an all-expenses-paid trip to Maldives for 2 adults when you check in daily and earn your free entries. T&C apply. Tap below to check in now.

isBoosterDefaultEven.title: Tap, Track, Win: Transact to earn +5 entries!
isBoosterDefaultEven.description: It's your lucky day! Every eligible transaction you make today earns you extra entries to win an all-expenses-paid trip to Maldives for 2 adults! Keep transacting for more entries to win cash prizes too. T&C apply. Tap below to view your Trackers.

isBoosterDefaultOdd.title: Tap, Track, Win: Check in now for +6 entries to win prizes!
isBoosterDefaultOdd.description: You could win an all-expenses-paid trip to Maldives for 2 with Tap, Track, Win, tap below to check in and earn your entry now! Then, keep transacting for more entries to win. T&C apply.

nonBoosterDefaultEven.title: Tap, Track, Win: Transact now to win exciting prizes!
nonBoosterDefaultEven.description: Win an all-expenses-paid trip to Maldives for 2 adults when you pay bills, transfer, reload and more! Every eligible transaction earns you entries to win cash prizes too. Make a transaction now to earn your next entry. T&C apply. Tap below to view your Trackers.
